#summary PTF CSVExport Tool: Get sensor data from your PRTG Server and export it to a .csv or .xml file..
#sidebar KrijcoWikiSidebar

= Introduction =

PTF CSVExport by default gets yesterdays data for the given sensors.
Adding PTF CSVExport to your Windows task scheduler can give you multiple export files (one for every sensor that you supply) in the folder of your choice every day.
Adding PTF CSVExport as a custom sensor to your PRTG Server can do the same thing.
